metadata.description: At head of title: Société des amis de la liberté et de l'égalité, séante aux ci-devant Jacobins, Saint-Honoré, a Paris. Du 26 mars 1793, l'an 2me. de la République française
On the death of Louis XVI and other matters

Martin & Walter IV 2: 16832 (which specifies: Adresses des députés des sociétés populaires de Digne, Manosque, Arles et Strasbourg) [edition 2: first line on p.14: "il ne se trouve un grand nombre de braves]
metadata.notes: Title page located on front cover. No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Worn, damaged and discolored pages and cover. Skewed text. Uneven binding.
